member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_COUNT
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves the number of video extension command parameters for the specified parameter stage.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_COUNT.CommandId
member.summary: The unique identifier for the video extension command for which the parameter count is queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_COUNT.Stage
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the parameter stage for which the parameter count is retrieved.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_COUNT.ParameterCount
member.summary: Receives the number of parameters in the parameter stage.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_COUNT.ParameterPacking
member.summary: Receives the parameter packing for the parameter stage.
